All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AbstractServlet
This is an abstract class for expending java servlet module to provide PATCH service.
CheckEmailServlet
This class handles POST request from the client side who is checking for account email duplicates.
DBConnector
(Singleton)DBConnector manages the connection between the server and database.
DeleteAccountServlet
This class handles DELETE request from the client side who is requesting for deletion of an account.
DeleteReceiptsServlet
This class handles DELETE request from the client side who is requesting for deletion of a receipt.
IndexServlet
This is the default home route.
LogInServlet
This class handles POST request from the client side who is requesting for loggin in.
Main
The program entry point.
MerchantData
Merchant object represents individual merchant entity.
MerchantServlet
This class handles GET request from the client side who is requesting for a list of merchant.
MerchantsModel
A wrapper class that includes error code and error message apart from a list of merchant.
ReceiptData
Receipt object represents individual receipt entity.
ReceiptServlet
This class handles POST request from the client side who is requesting for a list of receipts.
ReceiptsModel
A wrapper class that includes error code and error message apart from a list of receipts.
RegisterServlet
This class handles POST request from the client side who is requesting for registration.
ReportData
Report object represents individual monthly/yearly report entity.
ReportModel
A wrapper class that includes error code and error message apart from a report object.
ReportServlet
This class handles GET request from the client side who is requesting for a yearly/monthly report.
SearchFilter
Search filter class represents a search filter that contains the filtering criteria made by user.
SignOutServlet
This class handles GET request from the client side who is requesting of signing out of the current session.
SyncServlet
This class handles POST request from the client side who is requesting for backing up his/her account data.
UpdateAccountServlet
This class handles PATCH request from the client side who is requesting for updating his/her account details.
UserData
User object represents individual user entity.
UserModel
A wrapper class that includes error code and error message apart from a user.
